comment.author: 67127882@N07
comment._content: The Rt.Hon Iain Macleod,MP, Her Majesty's Principal Secretary of State for the Colonies,  makes his first Press statement on his arrival at Dar es Salaam airport, 17 December 1959. Left to right: Mr John Fletcher-Cooke,CMG, Deputy Governor; H E Sir Richard Turnbull, KCMG, Governor of Tanganyika; Mr Macleod; Mr Julius K Nyerere, leader of TANU   (Tanganyika African National Union).
